/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling city street, bathed in the soft glow of a setting sun. The sun's rays filter through the tall buildings, casting long shadows and painting the scene with a warm, golden hue. The street is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along the road, their headlights beginning to twinkle as dusk falls. Pedestrians can be seen strolling along the sidewalks, adding a human touch to the urban landscape. The buildings, towering on either side of the street, are a mix of architectural styles, suggesting a city that has grown and evolved over time. The perspective of the image is from ground level, looking down the street, giving a sense of being right there amidst the hustle and bustle.
